Authors:
Sirinapa - Konta, Prapassorn Damrongkool Eungwanichayapant,
Sajeewa S.N. Maharachchikumbura, Indunil Chinthani Senanayake, Eric H.C.
McKenzie, Marc Stadler, Saranyaphat Boonmee, Rungtiwa Phookamsak,
Chanokned Senwanna, Kevin D Hyde
Title:
A new genus Allodiatrype, five new species and a new host
record of diatrypaceous fungi from palms (Arecaceae)
Keywords:
5 novel taxa  Diatrypaceae  morphology  palm fungi 
phylogeny  Thai fungi  Xylariales
Abstract:
Diatrypaceous fungi on palms (Arecaceae) in Thailand were
collected and identified based on morphological as well as combined
sequence analyses (ITS and β-tubulin). One new genus Allodiatrype, Five
new species, Allocryptovalsa elaeidis, Allodiatrype arengae, A.
elaeidicola, A. elaeidis and Diatrypella elaeidis are introduced. A
checklist of Diatrypaceae occurring on palms (Arecaceae) and Thai
diatrypaceous fungi is also provided.
